languages.text: "Действительно, с чего бы это те, кого даже за людей не считают и массово истребляют, бунтовать могли бы? Загадка".
"You don't say! I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."
languages.original_text: "Действительно, с чего бы это те, кого даже за людей не считают и массово истребляют, бунтовать могли бы? Загадка".

traits.locale_text: "Gee, I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."
"Gee, I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."
"You do not say! Whatever reason would someone we call inhuman and exterminate by the thousands ever have to revolt? What a mystery indeed."
"You do not say! Whatever reason would someone we call inhuman and exterminate by the thousands ever have to revolt? What a mystery indeed."
"You don't say! I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."
"You don't say! I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."

languages.text: «¡No me diga! Me pregunto por qué se rebelará la gente a la que no consideramos humana y exterminamos como una plaga. Todo un misterio».
languages.original_text: "You don't say! I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."

traits.locale_text: «¡No me diga! Me pregunto por qué se rebelará la gente a la que no consideramos humana y exterminamos como una plaga. Todo un misterio».

languages.text: 「おやめください！我々が人間とみなさず、何千体と駆除してきた相手が反乱を起こすなどと思うのですか。実に狂気じみた謎です」
languages.original_text: "You don't say! I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."

traits.locale_text: 「おやめください！我々が人間とみなさず、何千体と駆除してきた相手が反乱を起こすなどと思うのですか。実に狂気じみた謎です」

languages.text: “可不是嘛！我也不明白，那些从来不被当人、动辄被大肆屠杀的人，他们干嘛要奋起反抗呢？这还真是个难解的世纪之谜呢。”
languages.original_text: "You don't say! I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."

traits.locale_text: “可不是嘛！我也不明白，那些从来不被当人、动辄被大肆屠杀的人，他们干嘛要奋起反抗呢？这还真是个难解的世纪之谜呢。”

languages.text: "Was Ihr nicht sagt! Ich frage mich, wieso jemand, den wir nicht für menschlich halten und zu Tausenden auslöschen, überhaupt eine Revolte erwägt. Ein eigentümliches Mysterium."
languages.original_text: "You don't say! I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."

traits.locale_text: "Was Ihr nicht sagt! Ich frage mich, wieso jemand, den wir nicht für menschlich halten und zu Tausenden auslöschen, überhaupt eine Revolte erwägt. Ein eigentümliches Mysterium."

languages.text: « Vraiment ? Vous voulez dire que des individus que nous ne considérons pas comme humains et que nous exterminons par milliers auraient eu l'audace de se révolter ? Comme c'est étrange ! »
languages.original_text: "You don't say! I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? Vous voulez dire que des individus que nous ne considérons pas comme humains et que nous exterminons par milliers auraient eu l'audace de se révolter ? Comme c'est étrange ! »

languages.text: "Deme! İnsan olarak görmediğimiz ve binlercesini katlettiğimiz birileri neden ayaklanır çok merak ettim. Tam bir muamma."
languages.original_text: "You don't say! I wonder why somebody we don't consider human and exterminate by the thousands would think to revolt. What a crazy mystery."
